products.title: Americano
products.content: A long black coffee, prepared by diluting an espresso with hot water.

products.title: Espresso Shot
products.content: Nothing more than a single espresso shot of our classico blend.

products.title: Latte
products.content: Espresso topped with steamed milk and a thin layer of micro-foam.

products.title: Cappuccino
products.content: Espresso with steamed milk, microfoam, and dusted with chocolate powder.

products.title: Macchiato
products.content: A single shot of our espresso - classico blend - with a touch of milk foam.

products.title: Flat White
products.content: A rich, intense ristretto based coffee drink made with whole milk.

products.title: Mocha
products.content: Our signature espresso topped with rich chocolate and steamed milk.

products.title: Caramelatte
products.content: Vanilla syrup, and steamed milk, topped with whipped cream and caramel sauce.
